PHRASE.LANG: Watch as Hamfred the hamster tries to shed some extra pounds by running on his wheel. [#Legal]
Observez Hamfred le hamster tenter de perdre du poids en courant dans sa roue. [#Legal]
Beobachten Sie, wie der Hamster Hamfred versucht, einige Extrapfunde im Laufrad zu verlieren. [#Legal]
Guarda il criceto Hamfred mentre cerca di buttare giù un po' di peso correndo sulla sua ruota. [#Legal]
Mira cómo Hamfred el hámster intenta perder unos gramos haciendo ejercicio en su rueda. [#Legal]
Watch as Hamfred the hamster tries to shed some extra pounds by running on his wheel. [#Legal]
